jot.math.geometry

Class Mesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • jot.math.geometry.Mesh
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Node
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PolygonMesh

    public abstract class Mesh
extends Object
implements Node
    Abstract class that a mesh (3D geometry representation) class must extend.
    Author:
    G. Amador & A. Gomes

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Mesh.PrimitiveType

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract int getIndexStride()
      Get the stride between indexes, e.g., a vertex, normals, and textureCoords are 3.
      abstract Material getMaterial(int index)
      Get a specific material with a given index from the materials list of this mesh.
      abstract ArrayList<Material> getMaterials()
      Get the material list of this mesh.
      abstract org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D getMaxVertex()
      Get the largest x, y, z values of all vertexes from this mesh.
      abstract org.apache.commons.math3.geometry.euclidean.threed.Vector3D getMinVertex()
      Get the lowest x, y, z values of all vertexes from this mesh.
      abstract FloatBuffer getNormals()
      Gets this mesh normals values.
      abstract IntBuffer getNormalsIndices()
      Gets this mesh normals indices values.
      abstract int getNormalsSize()
      Get the size of each normal, i.e., the number of terms required for each normal.
      abstract int getPrimitiveType()
      Get the primitive type to use when rendering if the setPrimitiveType method is never called default is TRIANGLES.
      abstract IntBuffer getTexCoordIndices()
      Gets this mesh texture coordinates indices values.
      abstract String getTexCoords2String()
      Get all textureCoords values as a string, i.e., convert the texture data buffer into a string.
      abstract FloatBuffer getTextureCoords()
      Gets this mesh texture coordinates values.
      abstract int getTextureCoordSize()
      Get the size of each textureCcoord, i.e., the number of terms required for each textureCoord, e.g., if using S,T values it would be 2.
      abstract ArrayList<Triangle> getTriangles()
      Get all the triangles of this mesh.
      abstract int getTrianglesCount()
      Get the triangles count for this mesh.
      abstract IntBuffer getVertexIndices()
      Gets this mesh vertex indices values.
      abstract FloatBuffer getVertices()
      Gets this mesh vertices values.
      abstract int getVerticesSize()
      Get the size of each vertex, i.e., the number of terms required for each vertex.
      abstract void setIndexStride(int indexStride)
      Set the stride between indexes, e.g., a vertex, normals, and textureCoords are 3.
      abstract void setMaterial(Material material)
      Set the last material from the materials list of this mesh.
      abstract void setMaterials(ArrayList<Material> materials)
      Set the material list of this mesh.
      abstract void setNormals(float[] normals)
      Converts a float array, with normals values, into a float buffer.
      abstract void setNormalsIndices(int[] normalsIndices)
      Converts a int array, with normalsIndices values, into a int buffer.
      abstract void setNormalsSize(int normalsSize)
      Set the size of each normal, i.e., the number of terms required for each normal.
      abstract void setPrimitiveType(Mesh.PrimitiveType primitiveType)
      Set the primitive type to use when rendering if this method is never called default is TRIANGLES.
      abstract void setTexCoordIndices(int[] texCoordIndices)
      Converts a int array, with textureCoordsIndices values, into a int buffer.
      abstract void setTextureCoords(float[] textureCoords)
      Converts a float array, with textureCoords values, into a float buffer.
      abstract void setTextureCoordSize(int textureCoordSize)
      Set the size of each textureCcoord, i.e., the number of terms required for each textureCoord, e.g., if using S,T values it would be 2.
      abstract void setTextures(ArrayList<com.jogamp.opengl.util.texture.Texture> textures)
      Set the textures list of the materials list of this mesh.
      abstract void setTriangles()
      Set all the triangles of this mesh.
      abstract void setUseDrawElements(boolean useDrawElements)
      Set use DrawElements or use DrawArrays.
      abstract void setVertexIndices(int[] vertexIndices)
      Converts a int array, with vertexIndices values, into a int buffer.
      abstract void setVertices(float[] vertices)
      Converts a float array, with vertices values, into a float buffer.
      abstract void setVerticesSize(int verticesSize)
      Set the size of each vertex, i.e., the number of terms required for each vertex.

        public abstract String getTexCoords2String()
        Get all textureCoords values as a string, i.e., convert the texture data buffer into a string.
        Returns:

      • setUseDrawElements

        public abstract void setUseDrawElements(boolean useDrawElements)
        Set use DrawElements or use DrawArrays.
        Parameters:
        useDrawElements - FALSE to use DrawArrays, TRUE to use DrawElements, default use DrawElements.

      • setTextures

        Set the textures list of the materials list of this mesh.
        Parameters:
        textures - the textures list of the materials list to set to this mesh.

      • getTextureCoordSize

        public abstract int getTextureCoordSize()
        Get the size of each textureCcoord, i.e., the number of terms required for each textureCoord, e.g., if using S,T values it would be 2.
        Returns:
        the size of each textureCcoord.

      • setTextureCoordSize

      • getIndexStride

        public abstract int getIndexStride()
        Get the stride between indexes, e.g., a vertex, normals, and textureCoords are 3.
        Returns:
        the stride between indexes.

      • setIndexStride

        public abstract void setIndexStride(int indexStride)
        Set the stride between indexes, e.g., a vertex, normals, and textureCoords are 3. This is required in the render process.
        Parameters:
        indexStride - the integer value of the primitive to use, e.g., QUADS.

      • getPrimitiveType

        public abstract int getPrimitiveType()
        Get the primitive type to use when rendering if the setPrimitiveType method is never called default is TRIANGLES.
        Returns:
        the primitive type to use when rendering.

      • setPrimitiveType

        public abstract void setPrimitiveType(Mesh.PrimitiveType primitiveType)
        Set the primitive type to use when rendering if this method is never called default is TRIANGLES.
        Parameters:
        primitiveType - the primitiveType value of the primitive to use, e.g., TRIANGLES.

        public abstract ArrayList<Material> getMaterials()

        Returns:
        this mesh material list.
